2024-01-03.title: The Boy And The Heron (Subtitled)
2024-01-03.synopsis: A young boy named Mahito yearning for his mother ventures into a world shared by the living and the dead. There death comes to an end, and life finds a new beginning. A semi-autobiographical fantasy about life, death and creation, in tribute to friendship from the mind of Hayao Miyazaki.

2024-01-03.title: Ferrari
2024-01-03.synopsis: It is the summer of 1957. Behind the spectacle of Formula 1, ex-racer Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy threatens the factory he and his wife, Laura built from nothing ten years earlier. Their volatile marriage has been battered by the loss of their son, Dino a year earlier. Ferrari struggles to acknowledge his son Piero with Lina Lardi. Meanwhile, his drivers’ passion to win pushes them to the edge as they launch into the treacherous 1,000-mile race across Italy, the Mille Miglia.

2024-01-03.title: Wonka
2024-01-03.synopsis: The Story will focus on a young Willy Wonka and his adventures prior to opening the world’s most famous chocolate factory.

2024-01-03.title: Next Goal Wins
2024-01-03.synopsis: Next Goal Wins tells the story of the American Samoa soccer team, who suffered the worst loss in World Cup history, losing to Australia 31-0 in 2001. With the 2014 World Cup approaching, the team recruits a down on his luck, maverick coach (Fassbender) to help turn their fate around.

2024-01-03.title: Saltburn
2024-01-03.synopsis: Struggling to find his place at Oxford University, student Oliver Quick finds himself drawn into the world of the charming and aristocratic Felix Catton, who invites him to Saltburn, his eccentric family's sprawling estate, for a summer never to be forgotten.

2024-01-03.title: Priscilla
2024-01-03.synopsis: When teenage Priscilla Beaulieu meets Elvis Presley at a party, the man who is already a meteoric rock-and-roll superstar becomes someone entirely unexpected in private moments: a thrilling crush, an ally in loneliness, a vulnerable best friend. Through Priscilla’s eyes, Sofia Coppola tells the unseen side of a great American myth in Elvis and Priscilla's long courtship and turbulent marriage, from a German army base to his dream-world estate at Graceland, in this deeply felt and ravishingly detailed portrait of love, fantasy, and fame.

2024-01-03.title: Anyone But You
2024-01-03.synopsis: In the comedy Anyone But You, Bea (Sydney Sweeney) and Ben (Glen Powell) look like the perfect couple, but after an amazing first date something happens that turns their fiery hot attraction ice cold - until they find themselves unexpectedly thrust together at a destination wedding in Australia. So they do what any two mature adults would do: pretend to be a couple.

2024-01-03.title: Society of the Snow
2024-01-03.synopsis: The flight of a rugby team crashes on a glacier in the Andes, few passengers who survived the crash, find themselves in one of the world's toughest environments to survive.

2024-01-03.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
2024-01-03.synopsis: When an ancient power is unleashed, Aquaman must forge an uneasy alliance with an unlikely ally to protect Atlantis, and the world, from irreversible devastation.

2024-01-03.title: DocHouse: Smoke Sauna Sisterhood
2024-01-03.synopsis:
In the warm, dense heat of a Southern Estonian smoke sauna, a group of women share their innermost secrets and intimate experiences. The rituals of the sauna envelop them, as they wash away the shame trapped in their bodies.

Filmmaker Anna Hints captures this intimate space up close, without any sense of intrusion. In the dark, enclosed space, her camera - richly lit with beams of golden daylight - frames bodies and faces in chiaroscuro, while the women give voice to their past experiences: sharing, accepting, finding laughter and solace, regaining their strength through a sense of communion.

Watching Smoke Sauna Sisterhood is a transformative experience for the viewer too, brought into a corporeal world of emotional veracity and deep empathy.

2024-01-03.title: Maestro
2024-01-03.synopsis: Maestro is a towering and fearless love story chronicling the lifelong relationship between Leonard Bernstein and Felicia Montealegre Cohn Bernstein. A love letter to life and art, Maestro at its core is an emotionally epic portrayal of family and love.

2024-01-04.title: Wonka
2024-01-04.synopsis: The Story will focus on a young Willy Wonka and his adventures prior to opening the world’s most famous chocolate factory.

2024-01-04.title: The Boy And The Heron (Dubbed)
2024-01-04.synopsis: The English dub for Hayao Miyazaki's latest adventure features an all-star cast that includes Robert Pattinson, Florence Pugh, Christian Bale, Willem Dafoe and Mark Hamill. The film follows a young boy named Mahito, who yearns for his late mother and ventures into a world shared by the living and the dead. There, death comes to an end, and life finds a new beginning. The Boy and the Heron is a dazzling, semi-autobiographical fantasy about life, death and creation.

2024-01-04.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
2024-01-04.synopsis: When an ancient power is unleashed, Aquaman must forge an uneasy alliance with an unlikely ally to protect Atlantis, and the world, from irreversible devastation.

2024-01-04.title: Napoleon
2024-01-04.synopsis: Napoleon is a spectacle-filled action epic that details the checkered rise and fall of the iconic French Emperor Napoleon Bonaparte, played by Oscar®-winner Joaquin Phoenix. Against a stunning backdrop of large-scale filmmaking orchestrated by legendary director Ridley Scott, the film captures Bonaparte's relentless journey to power through the prism of his addictive, volatile relationship with his one true love, Josephine, showcasing his visionary military and political tactics against some of the most dynamic practical battle sequences ever filmed.

2024-01-04.title: Ferrari
2024-01-04.synopsis: It is the summer of 1957. Behind the spectacle of Formula 1, ex-racer Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy threatens the factory he and his wife, Laura built from nothing ten years earlier. Their volatile marriage has been battered by the loss of their son, Dino a year earlier. Ferrari struggles to acknowledge his son Piero with Lina Lardi. Meanwhile, his drivers’ passion to win pushes them to the edge as they launch into the treacherous 1,000-mile race across Italy, the Mille Miglia.

2024-01-04.title: Next Goal Wins
2024-01-04.synopsis: Next Goal Wins tells the story of the American Samoa soccer team, who suffered the worst loss in World Cup history, losing to Australia 31-0 in 2001. With the 2014 World Cup approaching, the team recruits a down on his luck, maverick coach (Fassbender) to help turn their fate around.

2024-01-04.title: The Boy And The Heron (Subtitled)
2024-01-04.synopsis: A young boy named Mahito yearning for his mother ventures into a world shared by the living and the dead. There death comes to an end, and life finds a new beginning. A semi-autobiographical fantasy about life, death and creation, in tribute to friendship from the mind of Hayao Miyazaki.

2024-01-04.title: Sweet Sue
2024-01-04.synopsis: Fifty-something Sue (Maggie O’Neill) is now back on the dating scene. She meets a mysterious biker called Ron (Tony Pitts) at her brother's funeral and sparks fly. But when she meets Ron’s social-media influencer son Anthony (Harry Trevaldwyn), Sue finds herself in an increasingly surreal battle of wills with this ambitious teenager who is convinced that his dance troupe ‘Electric Destiny’ is tipped for stardom. Will she find the purpose and imagination to bring this little unconventional family together for a chance at happiness?

2024-01-04.title: Priscilla
2024-01-04.synopsis: When teenage Priscilla Beaulieu meets Elvis Presley at a party, the man who is already a meteoric rock-and-roll superstar becomes someone entirely unexpected in private moments: a thrilling crush, an ally in loneliness, a vulnerable best friend. Through Priscilla’s eyes, Sofia Coppola tells the unseen side of a great American myth in Elvis and Priscilla's long courtship and turbulent marriage, from a German army base to his dream-world estate at Graceland, in this deeply felt and ravishingly detailed portrait of love, fantasy, and fame.

2024-01-04.title: Saltburn
2024-01-04.synopsis: Struggling to find his place at Oxford University, student Oliver Quick finds himself drawn into the world of the charming and aristocratic Felix Catton, who invites him to Saltburn, his eccentric family's sprawling estate, for a summer never to be forgotten.

2024-01-04.title: Society of the Snow
2024-01-04.synopsis: The flight of a rugby team crashes on a glacier in the Andes, few passengers who survived the crash, find themselves in one of the world's toughest environments to survive.

2024-01-04.title: Chicken Run: Dawn of the Nugget
2024-01-04.synopsis: After escaping from Tweedy's farm, Ginger and all the chickens living the dream in their peaceful island sanctuary, far from the dangers of the human world.

2024-01-04.title: Anyone But You
2024-01-04.synopsis: In the comedy Anyone But You, Bea (Sydney Sweeney) and Ben (Glen Powell) look like the perfect couple, but after an amazing first date something happens that turns their fiery hot attraction ice cold - until they find themselves unexpectedly thrust together at a destination wedding in Australia. So they do what any two mature adults would do: pretend to be a couple.

2024-01-04.title: One Life
2024-01-04.synopsis: Follows British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

2024-01-04.title: Anatomy of a Fall
2024-01-04.synopsis: When her husband Samuel is mysteriously found dead in the snow below their secluded chalet, Sandra becomes the main suspect when the police begin to question whether he fell or was pushed. The trial soon becomes not just an investigation, but a gripping psychological journey into the depths of Sandra and Samuel's complicated marriage. With conflicting evidence and inconsistent testimony, words are wielded like weapons and shocking truths come to light in this thrilling Palme d’Or winner.

2024-01-04.title: Tchaikovsky's Wife
2024-01-04.synopsis: Tumultuous relationship between Pyotr Tchaikovsky, the most famous Russian composer of all time, and his wife Antonina Miliukova.

2024-01-04.title: Anselm (2D)
2024-01-04.synopsis:
An experience like no other. Wim Wenders creates a portrait of Anselm Kiefer, one of the most innovative and important painters and sculptors of our time, shot in 3D and 6K-resolution. 

The film presents a total immersion in the artist’s work and practice which explores human existence and the cyclical nature of history, inspired by literature, poetry, philosophy, science, mythology and religion. For over two years, Wenders traced Kiefer’s path from his native Germany to his current home in France, connecting the stages of his life to the essential places of his career that spans more than five decades.

2024-01-04.title: Maestro
2024-01-04.synopsis: Maestro is a towering and fearless love story chronicling the lifelong relationship between Leonard Bernstein and Felicia Montealegre Cohn Bernstein. A love letter to life and art, Maestro at its core is an emotionally epic portrayal of family and love.

2024-01-04.title: DocHouse: My Name Is Alfred Hitchcock
2024-01-04.synopsis:
A century after Alfred Hitchcock's first feature, Mark Cousins (The Story of Film, The Eyes of Orson Welles) looks at the auteur with a new and radical approach.

Accompanied by Hitchcock's narration (voiced by Alistair McGowan), we are taken on a playful and revealing odyssey through the auteur's vast and magnificent career.

2024-01-04.title: DocHouse: While We Watched
2024-01-04.synopsis: A gripping newsroom drama, following broadcast journalist Ravish Kumar as he fearlessly tackles misinformation and incompetent governance in India. Kumar and his team at NDTV fight tirelessly to report on the stories overlooked by pro-government mainstream media. However, this is no easy feat as, increasingly, many sensationalise criticism of the Modi government as treason. With fervent nationalism on the rise, dissidents are labelled as enemies of India, with their lives and livelihoods viciously attacked. With budget cuts, mass resignations and mounting death threats, can Kumar persevere in the face of adversity? While We Watched is a riveting tale of truth, courage and journalistic integrity. Kumar’s unyielding spirit is captured brilliantly, and we watch as he faces seemingly unending challenges. With factual reporting in international crisis, director Vinay Shukla trains his lens on a beleaguered lone voice, providing us with hope that there are still determined forces dedicated to speaking truth to power."

2024-01-04.title: DocHouse: 20 Days In Mariupol
2024-01-04.synopsis:
On the eve of Russia’s invasion of Ukraine, a team of Ukrainian journalists enter the strategic eastern port city of Mariupol. During the subsequent siege and assault, as bombs fall, inhabitants flee, and access to electricity, food, water and medicine are severed, the team — the only international journalists left — struggles to cover the war and to transmit their footage out.

Ukrainian filmmaker and journalist Mstyslav Chernov offers a window into the practices of conflict zone reporters and an unflinching, anguishing account of the 20 days he and colleagues Evgeniy Maloletka and Vasilisa Stepanenko spent covering Mariupol. Chernov wonders how capturing such footage can make a difference, but residents implore them to let the world bear witness.

2024-01-05.title: Wonka
2024-01-05.synopsis: The Story will focus on a young Willy Wonka and his adventures prior to opening the world’s most famous chocolate factory.

2024-01-05.title: Anselm (2D)
2024-01-05.synopsis:
An experience like no other. Wim Wenders creates a portrait of Anselm Kiefer, one of the most innovative and important painters and sculptors of our time, shot in 3D and 6K-resolution. 

The film presents a total immersion in the artist’s work and practice which explores human existence and the cyclical nature of history, inspired by literature, poetry, philosophy, science, mythology and religion. For over two years, Wenders traced Kiefer’s path from his native Germany to his current home in France, connecting the stages of his life to the essential places of his career that spans more than five decades.

2024-01-05.title: DocHouse: Scala!!!
2024-01-05.synopsis:
In Britain’s post-punk Thatcher years, the infamous and legendary Scala cinema showed a diverse range of films, from high art to cult classics, sexploitation, horror, Kung-Fu and LGBTQIA+. Nudging boundaries of convention, it became an inspiration for future famous creatives.

With interviews from nearly 50 contributors, previously unseen archive footage and film clips, Scala!!! is an anarchic, uproarious documentary telling the riotous inside story, with an original soundtrack by celebrated musician Barry Adamson.

Transcending nostalgia, Scala!!! is a universal testament to the power of cinemas, providing refuge and community for outsiders. A place where everyone is welcome.

2024-01-05.title: DocHouse: Smoke Sauna Sisterhood
2024-01-05.synopsis:
In the warm, dense heat of a Southern Estonian smoke sauna, a group of women share their innermost secrets and intimate experiences. The rituals of the sauna envelop them, as they wash away the shame trapped in their bodies.

Filmmaker Anna Hints captures this intimate space up close, without any sense of intrusion. In the dark, enclosed space, her camera - richly lit with beams of golden daylight - frames bodies and faces in chiaroscuro, while the women give voice to their past experiences: sharing, accepting, finding laughter and solace, regaining their strength through a sense of communion.

Watching Smoke Sauna Sisterhood is a transformative experience for the viewer too, brought into a corporeal world of emotional veracity and deep empathy.

2024-01-06.title: Poor Things
2024-01-06.synopsis: From filmmaker Yorgos Lanthimos and producer Emma Stone comes the incredible tale and fantastical evolution of Bella Baxter (Stone), a young woman brought back to life by the brilliant and unorthodox scientist Dr. Godwin Baxter (Dafoe).

2024-01-06.title: Society of the Snow
2024-01-06.synopsis: The flight of a rugby team crashes on a glacier in the Andes, few passengers who survived the crash, find themselves in one of the world's toughest environments to survive.

2024-01-06.title: One Life
2024-01-06.synopsis: Follows British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

2024-01-06.title: Anyone But You
2024-01-06.synopsis: In the comedy Anyone But You, Bea (Sydney Sweeney) and Ben (Glen Powell) look like the perfect couple, but after an amazing first date something happens that turns their fiery hot attraction ice cold - until they find themselves unexpectedly thrust together at a destination wedding in Australia. So they do what any two mature adults would do: pretend to be a couple.

2024-01-06.title: Met Opera 2024: Nabucco
2024-01-06.synopsis:
Ancient Babylon comes to life in a classic Met staging of biblical proportions. Baritone George Gagnidze makes his Met role debut as the imperious king Nabucco, alongside Ukrainian soprano Liudmyla Monastyrska reprising her thrilling turn as his vengeful daughter Abigaille. Mezzo-soprano Maria Barakova and tenor SeokJong Baek, in his company debut, are Fenena and Ismaele, and bass Dmitry Belosselskiy repeats his celebrated portrayal of the high priest Zaccaria. Daniele Callegari conducts Verdi’s early masterpiece, which features the ultimate showcase for
the great Met Chorus, the moving “Va, pensiero.”

2024-01-06.title: Kids Club: Paw Patrol: The Mighty Movie
2024-01-06.synopsis: When a magical meteor crash lands in Adventure City, it gives the PAW Patrol pups superpowers, transforming them into The MIGHTY PUPS! For Skye, the smallest member of the team, her new powers are a dream come true. But things take a turn for the worse when the pups' archrival Humdinger breaks out of jail and teams up with a mad scientist to steal the superpowers for the two villains. With the fate of Adventure City hanging in the balance, the Mighty Pups have to stop the supervillains before it's too late, and Skye will need to learn that even the smallest pup can make the biggest difference.

2024-01-06.title: May December
2024-01-06.synopsis: May December follows married couple Gracie and Joe Atherton-Yoo (Julianne Moore and Charles Melton) whose 23-year age gap sparked a notorious tabloid romance that gripped the nation two decades ago. Cut to modern day, and their marriage comes under renewed strain when Hollywood actress Elizabeth Berry (Natalie Portman) comes to spend time with the family to better understand Gracie, who she will be playing in a film about the scandal.

2024-01-06.title: Sweet Sue
2024-01-06.synopsis: Fifty-something Sue (Maggie O’Neill) is now back on the dating scene. She meets a mysterious biker called Ron (Tony Pitts) at her brother's funeral and sparks fly. But when she meets Ron’s social-media influencer son Anthony (Harry Trevaldwyn), Sue finds herself in an increasingly surreal battle of wills with this ambitious teenager who is convinced that his dance troupe ‘Electric Destiny’ is tipped for stardom. Ukrainian filmmaker and journalist Mstyslav Chernov offers a window into the practices of conflict zone reporters and an unflinching, anguishing account of the 20 days he and colleagues Evgeniy Maloletka and Vasilisa Stepanenko spent covering Mariupol. Chernov wonders how capturing such footage can make a difference, but residents implore them to let the world bear witness.

In Britain’s post-punk Thatcher years, the infamous and legendary Scala cinema showed a diverse range of films, from high art to cult classics, sexploitation, horror, Kung-Fu and LGBTQIA+. Nudging boundaries of convention, it became an inspiration for future famous creatives.

With interviews from nearly 50 contributors, previously unseen archive footage and film clips, Scala!!! is an anarchic, uproarious documentary telling the riotous inside story, with an original soundtrack by celebrated musician Barry Adamson.

Transcending nostalgia, Scala!!! is a universal testament to the power of cinemas, providing refuge and community for outsiders. A place where everyone is welcome.

2024-01-06.title: DocHouse: Stop Making Sense
2024-01-06.synopsis:
The greatest concert film of all time, Stop Making Sense brings to the screen Talking Heads at Hollywood's Pantages Theater in December 1983: David Byrne, Tina Weymouth, Chris Frantz and Jerry Harrison, alongside an ecstatic ensemble of supporting musicians. 

Renowned filmmaker Jonathan Demme (Silence of the Lambs) captures the band at their exhilarating best, in this new and complete restoration for the film's 40th anniversary.

2024-01-06.title: DocHouse: Smoke Sauna Sisterhood
2024-01-06.synopsis:
In the warm, dense heat of a Southern Estonian smoke sauna, a group of women share their innermost secrets and intimate experiences. The rituals of the sauna envelop them, as they wash away the shame trapped in their bodies.

Filmmaker Anna Hints captures this intimate space up close, without any sense of intrusion. In the dark, enclosed space, her camera - richly lit with beams of golden daylight - frames bodies and faces in chiaroscuro, while the women give voice to their past experiences: sharing, accepting, finding laughter and solace, regaining their strength through a sense of communion.

Watching Smoke Sauna Sisterhood is a transformative experience for the viewer too, brought into a corporeal world of emotional veracity and deep empathy.

2024-01-07.title: Wonka
2024-01-07.synopsis: The Story will focus on a young Willy Wonka and his adventures prior to opening the world’s most famous chocolate factory.

2024-01-07.title: The Boy And The Heron (Dubbed)
2024-01-07.synopsis: The English dub for Hayao Miyazaki's latest adventure features an all-star cast that includes Robert Pattinson, Florence Pugh, Christian Bale, Willem Dafoe and Mark Hamill. The film follows a young boy named Mahito, who yearns for his late mother and ventures into a world shared by the living and the dead. There, death comes to an end, and life finds a new beginning. The Boy and the Heron is a dazzling, semi-autobiographical fantasy about life, death and creation.

2024-01-07.title: Ferrari
2024-01-07.synopsis: It is the summer of 1957. Behind the spectacle of Formula 1, ex-racer Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy threatens the factory he and his wife, Laura built from nothing ten years earlier. Their volatile marriage has been battered by the loss of their son, Dino a year earlier. Ferrari struggles to acknowledge his son Piero with Lina Lardi. Meanwhile, his drivers’ passion to win pushes them to the edge as they launch into the treacherous 1,000-mile race across Italy, the Mille Miglia.

2024-01-07.title: Maestro
2024-01-07.synopsis: Maestro is a towering and fearless love story chronicling the lifelong relationship between Leonard Bernstein and Felicia Montealegre Cohn Bernstein. A love letter to life and art, Maestro at its core is an emotionally epic portrayal of family and love.

2024-01-07.title: Priscilla
2024-01-07.synopsis: When teenage Priscilla Beaulieu meets Elvis Presley at a party, the man who is already a meteoric rock-and-roll superstar becomes someone entirely unexpected in private moments: a thrilling crush, an ally in loneliness, a vulnerable best friend. Through Priscilla’s eyes, Sofia Coppola tells the unseen side of a great American myth in Elvis and Priscilla's long courtship and turbulent marriage, from a German army base to his dream-world estate at Graceland, in this deeply felt and ravishingly detailed portrait of love, fantasy, and fame.

2024-01-07.title: Napoleon
2024-01-07.synopsis: Napoleon is a spectacle-filled action epic that details the checkered rise and fall of the iconic French Emperor Napoleon Bonaparte, played by Oscar®-winner Joaquin Phoenix. Against a stunning backdrop of large-scale filmmaking orchestrated by legendary director Ridley Scott, the film captures Bonaparte's relentless journey to power through the prism of his addictive, volatile relationship with his one true love, Josephine, showcasing his visionary military and political tactics against some of the most dynamic practical battle sequences ever filmed.

2024-01-07.title: The Boy And The Heron (Subtitled)
2024-01-07.synopsis: A young boy named Mahito yearning for his mother ventures into a world shared by the living and the dead. There death comes to an end, and life finds a new beginning. A semi-autobiographical fantasy about life, death and creation, in tribute to friendship from the mind of Hayao Miyazaki.

2024-01-07.title: Poor Things
2024-01-07.synopsis: From filmmaker Yorgos Lanthimos and producer Emma Stone comes the incredible tale and fantastical evolution of Bella Baxter (Stone), a young woman brought back to life by the brilliant and unorthodox scientist Dr. Godwin Baxter (Dafoe).

2024-01-07.title: Saltburn
2024-01-07.synopsis: Struggling to find his place at Oxford University, student Oliver Quick finds himself drawn into the world of the charming and aristocratic Felix Catton, who invites him to Saltburn, his eccentric family's sprawling estate, for a summer never to be forgotten.

2024-01-07.title: One Life
2024-01-07.synopsis: Follows British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

2024-01-07.title: Society of the Snow
2024-01-07.synopsis: The flight of a rugby team crashes on a glacier in the Andes, few passengers who survived the crash, find themselves in one of the world's toughest environments to survive.

2024-01-07.title: Anyone But You
2024-01-07.synopsis: In the comedy Anyone But You, Bea (Sydney Sweeney) and Ben (Glen Powell) look like the perfect couple, but after an amazing first date something happens that turns their fiery hot attraction ice cold - until they find themselves unexpectedly thrust together at a destination wedding in Australia. So they do what any two mature adults would do: pretend to be a couple.

2024-01-07.title: Anatomy of a Fall
2024-01-07.synopsis: When her husband Samuel is mysteriously found dead in the snow below their secluded chalet, Sandra becomes the main suspect when the police begin to question whether he fell or was pushed. The trial soon becomes not just an investigation, but a gripping psychological journey into the depths of Sandra and Samuel's complicated marriage. With conflicting evidence and inconsistent testimony, words are wielded like weapons and shocking truths come to light in this thrilling Palme d’Or winner.

2024-01-07.title: Sweet Sue
2024-01-07.synopsis: Fifty-something Sue (Maggie O’Neill) is now back on the dating scene. She meets a mysterious biker called Ron (Tony Pitts) at her brother's funeral and sparks fly. But when she meets Ron’s social-media influencer son Anthony (Harry Trevaldwyn), Sue finds herself in an increasingly surreal battle of wills with this ambitious teenager who is convinced that his dance troupe ‘Electric Destiny’ is tipped for stardom. Will she find the purpose and imagination to bring this little unconventional family together for a chance at happiness?

2024-01-07.title: Anselm (2D)
2024-01-07.synopsis:
An experience like no other. Wim Wenders creates a portrait of Anselm Kiefer, one of the most innovative and important painters and sculptors of our time, shot in 3D and 6K-resolution. 

The film presents a total immersion in the artist’s work and practice which explores human existence and the cyclical nature of history, inspired by literature, poetry, philosophy, science, mythology and religion. For over two years, Wenders traced Kiefer’s path from his native Germany to his current home in France, connecting the stages of his life to the essential places of his career that spans more than five decades.

2024-01-07.title: DocHouse: Smoke Sauna Sisterhood
2024-01-07.synopsis:
In the warm, dense heat of a Southern Estonian smoke sauna, a group of women share their innermost secrets and intimate experiences. The rituals of the sauna envelop them, as they wash away the shame trapped in their bodies.

Filmmaker Anna Hints captures this intimate space up close, without any sense of intrusion. In the dark, enclosed space, her camera - richly lit with beams of golden daylight - frames bodies and faces in chiaroscuro, while the women give voice to their past experiences: sharing, accepting, finding laughter and solace, regaining their strength through a sense of communion.

Watching Smoke Sauna Sisterhood is a transformative experience for the viewer too, brought into a corporeal world of emotional veracity and deep empathy.

2024-01-07.title: DocHouse: My Imaginary Country
2024-01-07.synopsis:
Ever since the turmoil of 1973 that forced documentary filmmaker Patricio Guzmán to leave Chile, he has documented his homeland - in films such as Nostalgia for the Light, The Pearl Button and The Cordillera of Dreams - a country still suffering under the weight of Pinochet's legacy, constitution and decades of inequality, corruption and denial.

 

Then, in October 2019, there is an unexpected revolution, a social explosion; one and a half million people demonstrate in the streets of Santiago calling for democracy, a more dignified life and a new constitution. Chile has recovered its memory.

In his latest film, the renowned documentary-maker returns his razor-sharp gaze to a country on the cusp of long overdue change.  Focussing on the on the pivotal role played by women, he traces the people's path through mass protest to constitutional change. 

With astonishment and great hope, Guzmán documents Chile's surge towards becoming the country he imagines.

2024-01-07.title: DocHouse: Scala!!!
2024-01-07.synopsis:
In Britain’s post-punk Thatcher years, the infamous and legendary Scala cinema showed a diverse range of films, from high art to cult classics, sexploitation, horror, Kung-Fu and LGBTQIA+. Nudging boundaries of convention, it became an inspiration for future famous creatives.

With interviews from nearly 50 contributors, previously unseen archive footage and film clips, Scala!!! is an anarchic, uproarious documentary telling the riotous inside story, with an original soundtrack by celebrated musician Barry Adamson.

Transcending nostalgia, Scala!!! is a universal testament to the power of cinemas, providing refuge and community for outsiders. A place where everyone is welcome.

2024-01-07.title: DocHouse: 20 Days In Mariupol
2024-01-07.synopsis:
On the eve of Russia’s invasion of Ukraine, a team of Ukrainian journalists enter the strategic eastern port city of Mariupol. During the subsequent siege and assault, as bombs fall, inhabitants flee, and access to electricity, food, water and medicine are severed, the team — the only international journalists left — struggles to cover the war and to transmit their footage out.

Ukrainian filmmaker and journalist Mstyslav Chernov offers a window into the practices of conflict zone reporters and an unflinching, anguishing account of the 20 days he and colleagues Evgeniy Maloletka and Vasilisa Stepanenko spent covering Mariupol. Chernov wonders how capturing such footage can make a difference, but residents implore them to let the world bear witness.

2024-01-10.title: The Lost Boys
2024-01-10.synopsis:
Joe is about to be released from a detention centre. Should the judge approve his discharge, he will return to society and an uncertain life on the other side of the security fence. But when a new detainee, William, arrives in his facility, Joe starts to question his desire for freedom.

Featuring stand-out performances from Khalil Gharbia (Peter von Kant) and Julien De Saint Jean (Lie With Me), filmmaker Zeno Graton’s acclaimed first feature THE LOST BOYS is a compelling and sensitively observed portrait of burgeoning masculinity and queer sexuality.

2024-01-10.title: Napoleon
2024-01-10.synopsis: Napoleon is a spectacle-filled action epic that details the checkered rise and fall of the iconic French Emperor Napoleon Bonaparte, played by Oscar®-winner Joaquin Phoenix. Against a stunning backdrop of large-scale filmmaking orchestrated by legendary director Ridley Scott, the film captures Bonaparte's relentless journey to power through the prism of his addictive, volatile relationship with his one true love, Josephine, showcasing his visionary military and political tactics against some of the most dynamic practical battle sequences ever filmed.

2024-01-10.title: May December
2024-01-10.synopsis: May December follows married couple Gracie and Joe Atherton-Yoo (Julianne Moore and Charles Melton) whose 23-year age gap sparked a notorious tabloid romance that gripped the nation two decades ago. Cut to modern day, and their marriage comes under renewed strain when Hollywood actress Elizabeth Berry (Natalie Portman) comes to spend time with the family to better understand Gracie, who she will be playing in a film about the scandal.

For over two years, Wenders traced Kiefer’s path from his native Germany to his current home in France, connecting the stages of his life to the essential places of his career that spans more than five decades.

2024-01-10.title: DocHouse: Scala!!!
2024-01-10.synopsis:
In Britain’s post-punk Thatcher years, the infamous and legendary Scala cinema showed a diverse range of films, from high art to cult classics, sexploitation, horror, Kung-Fu and LGBTQIA+. Nudging boundaries of convention, it became an inspiration for future famous creatives.

With interviews from nearly 50 contributors, previously unseen archive footage and film clips, Scala!!! is an anarchic, uproarious documentary telling the riotous inside story, with an original soundtrack by celebrated musician Barry Adamson.

Transcending nostalgia, Scala!!! is a universal testament to the power of cinemas, providing refuge and community for outsiders. A place where everyone is welcome.

2024-01-10.title: DocHouse: Smoke Sauna Sisterhood
2024-01-10.synopsis:
In the warm, dense heat of a Southern Estonian smoke sauna, a group of women share their innermost secrets and intimate experiences. The rituals of the sauna envelop them, as they wash away the shame trapped in their bodies.

Filmmaker Anna Hints captures this intimate space up close, without any sense of intrusion. In the dark, enclosed space, her camera - richly lit with beams of golden daylight - frames bodies and faces in chiaroscuro, while the women give voice to their past experiences: sharing, accepting, finding laughter and solace, regaining their strength through a sense of communion.

Watching Smoke Sauna Sisterhood is a transformative experience for the viewer too, brought into a corporeal world of emotional veracity and deep empathy.

2024-01-10.title: DocHouse: Iraq's Invisible Beauty
2024-01-10.synopsis:
Latif al-Ani, the beloved 'father of Iraqi photography', captured his country in its heyday from the 1950s to 1970s. When Saddam Hussein took power, al-Ani put down his camera. His photographs form a unique archive showing a cosmopolitan Iraq, before the devastation of war, that many Westerners and even Iraqi people themselves have never seen.

In Iraq's Invisible Beauty, 86-year-old al-Ani travels across his devastated homeland, accompanied by Belgian-Kurdish filmmaker Sahim Omar Kalifa, in search of the places he once knew and captured on film. On this final trip, he shows his photographs to the people he meets, who cannot believe the vibrant and prosperous Iraq he presents to them.

Al-Ani died in 2021, soon after the completion of this film, which forms a moving tribute to the great photographer and the country he lost.
